products.name: Nike AirFlex Running Shoes
products.description: Lightweight, breathable running shoes designed for all-day comfort and peak performance
products.target_demographic: Active men and women aged 18-35 who enjoy running and fitness

products.name: Nike Sport Cap
products.description: Adjustable lightweight cap with sweat-wicking technology for sports and casual wear
products.target_demographic: Young athletes and lifestyle enthusiasts aged 16-30

target_audience: Fitness enthusiasts, athletes, and lifestyle consumers seeking performance and style
campaign_message: Stay cool, stay fast — Nike Summer Vibes 2025
